short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maysie is a fashion discovery app tailored for you to explore and compare thousands of fashion brands available in Asia.
short.zh_TW: Maysie是為您而設的時裝搜尋引擎，讓您可以輕鬆找尋及比較來自不同品牌的最新時裝產品。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Chrome Extension of Maysie"
The browser extension is an add-on to Maysie (https://maysie.io), a fashion discovery app tailored for you to explore thousands of apparel items in East Asia, which makes it even simpler for you to search for similar products through image search and synchronize your favourite products with the stores' carts to make checkout more convenient.

"New Experience Of Fashion Discovery"
* Easily find the products you want by leveraging Maysie's multiple keyword search functionalities.
* Search for the exact colour in your mind through the use of Maysie' colour palette. 
* Take a picture or upload a photo from your album to look for visually similar products.
* Recommendations Just For You - Maysie learns from your preference to curate a personalized list of items for you. We are constantly improving the recommendation methodology to serve you the best fit.
* Track Deals - Keep track of discounts for specific products.
* Collections - Create and save your stylish collections from products you like.
long.zh_TW:
"Maysie Chrome擴充功能"
Maysie (https://maysie.io) 讓你可以輕鬆探索大量不同網上可以購買的時裝品牌。Maysie的Chrome擴充功能令您更容易以圖片搜尋相似貨品，並把您已儲存的產品同步至網上商店的購物車。

"探索時裝的全新體驗" 
* 追踪優惠 - 緊貼您有興趣產品的最新優惠。
* 利用多重關鍵字搜尋時裝產品。
* 使用調色盤找到任何服裝顏色。
* 圖像搜尋讓您可以透過上載相片或拍照來搜尋相似貨品。
* 個人化推薦 - 通過了解您的喜好推薦適合您的產品。
* 收藏 - 製作並儲存您喜愛的配搭。
